column4: hi, i have a question: i have a folder full of subfolders with pictures. many of the pics are dupplicates, i have used fslink to create hardlinks to dupplicates to save disk space. i now want to copy all the folder to a usb drive (for backup) how do i do that without it taking too much space and creating dupplicates all over again?
what format is the USB drive?
try cp -pPr it should copy links and permissions.
